info.+content: Popuko and Pipimi are a pair of foul mouthed girls ready to take on every pop culture reference ever made. Pop Team Epic follows the pair through a series of surreal skits and short stories full of internet, movie, video game, and self-referential based comedy.
"Poppy Pappy Day" by by Yui Makino, Kenji Akabane,Yui Watanabe & Shunsuke Takeuchi
"LET'S POP TOGETHER" by Kenji Akabane & Shunsuke Takeuchi
"LET'S POP TOGETHER" by Yui Makino & Yui Watanabe
